query.statement:
SELECT '' AS CODE1 ,'' AS CODE ,'' AS CODE_NAME ,'' AS ORD FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION ALL
SELECT CODE1 AS CODE1 , CODE2 AS CODE , CTEXT2 AS CODE_NAME , SAPHEE.FILLINZERO(CODE2,12) AS ORD FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 LIKE #GUBN# ||'%'
ORDER BY CODE1, ORD ASC
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
